name: YEKTA
description:
In order to save the life of your daughter, you must take a doll with dangerous magic back to the god Yekta, in order to save your daughter.  Along the way you will use the doll to ward off ghosts, but be careful, the magic of the doll can trap you or as easily hurt you as it can the spirits who block your path.

This is my first game project I've ever made.  It was done for a gamejam (Jamegam#19) where the theme was "It's spreading"  and the special object of the game was required to be a type of toy.  I made this actually to start making more music for games, but the actual act of making the game took way longer than I anticipated,  in fact,  the music of the game was created in a frantic 1 1/2 composing and recording session on Logic Pro X before being thrown in the game right before the game jam deadline.

As it's my first game, I'm sure there's many issues/bugs, so please let me know.

Enjoy!
